com.dqgb.sshframe.common.util

类 BlowFish

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dqgb.sshframe.common.util.BlowFish

  • public class BlowFish
extends Object
    数据加密，其加密算法采用SHA1
    从以下版本开始:
    V1.20
    版本:
    V1.20,2013-12-6 下午2:52:26
    作者:
    wanglc
    另请参阅:

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      BlowFish(String password)
      Title: BlowFish Description: Creates a new Blowfish object using the specified key (oversized password will be cut)

    • 方法概要

      解密字符
      String decryptString(String sCipherText)
      decrypts a hexbin string (handling is case sensitive)
      void destroy()
      destroys (clears) the encryption engine, after that the instance is not valid anymore

    • 构造器详细资料

      • BlowFish

        public BlowFish(String password)

        Title: BlowFish

        Description: Creates a new Blowfish object using the specified key (oversized password will be cut)

        参数:
        password - password the password (treated as a real unicode array)

      • encryptString

        public String encryptString(String sPlainText)
        参数:
        sPlainText - sPlainText string to encrypt
        返回:
        encrypted string in binhex format
        创建日期
        2013-12-6

      • decryptString

        public String decryptString(String sCipherText)
        decrypts a hexbin string (handling is case sensitive)
        参数:
        sCipherText - sCipherText hexbin string to decrypt
        返回:
        decrypted string (null equals an error)
        创建日期
        2013-12-6

      • destroy

        public void destroy()
        destroys (clears) the encryption engine, after that the instance is not valid anymore
        创建日期
        2013-12-6
